sentences.en: An angle in a semicircle is a right angle.
sentences.cn: 半圆所对的圆周角是直角.

sentences.en: I asked my student to sit in a semicircle to listen to the story.
sentences.cn: 我让我的学生们围成半圆坐着听故事.

sentences.en: Please put the chairs a semicircle.
Semicircle steel sheets were welded on the wall of evaporation pipes in fluidizedroaster for anti - abrasion.
sentences.cn: 为减少磨损,沸腾炉内蒸发管采用加焊半圆形钢板防磨.

sentences.en: Semicircle switch, when starting also will pass the blue color the ray, both artistic and mystical.

sentences.en: Shaobing ji shan has semicircle and triangle, also known as the guo kui semicircle.
sentences.cn: 稷山烧饼有半圆的和三角的, 半圆的又叫锅盔.

sentences.en: The apron surrounding the high jump pit is a 15 - meter semicircle.
sentences.cn: 跳高处的周围是直径为15米的半圆区域.

sentences.en: The children sit in a semicircle, listening closely ( attentively ) to my stories.
sentences.cn: 孩子们围坐成 半圆形,专心地听我讲故事.

sentences.en: The shape of herniated discs liked semicircle or ellipsoidal.
sentences.cn: 在冠状位上呈钻头状,游离型椎间盘呈条索状,或不规则形.

sentences.en: The village was formed of semicircle huts.
sentences.cn: 这个村庄是由半圆形的茅舍组成的.

sentences.en: They are sitting in a semicircle.
They sit cross-legged in a semicircle and share stories.
sentences.cn: 他们盘着腿围成半圆坐在一起讲故事。

sentences.en: We sat in a semicircle about the fire.
sentences.cn: 我们坐在火旁,围成个半圆形.

sentences.en: We sat in a semicircle facing the teacher.
sentences.cn: 我们面对着老师坐成半圆形.
